title: IIT Kanpur Notification 2026 - Apply for Project Engineer Posts
description: Indian Institute of Technology Kanpur (IIT Kanpur) has declared the latest job notification for 2026. To fill up the various vacancies for Project Engineer Jobs. Those candidates who have qualified in the B.E/ B.Tech, M.E/ M.Tech in Electrical Engineering can usethis chance and apply for the IIT Kanpur Notification 202 6. Here we mentioned moredetails about the age limit, selection process, salary structure, education details, application fee, and how to apply for these posts. If you are look...
